page.title: 06Brenchley/Matfield Magazine.
page.content: { "ROUNDABOUT"}is the villages local magazine delivered by{45}distributors on the last Saturday of each{month.}It is available by{subscription}or at the {Post Offices}and{Young's Stores.}About {670}magazines are printed monthly.The {editor,}who is helped by a treasurer and distribution manager, decides what goes in the magazine.It takes{4}ladies about{6}hours to type the script. About{50%}of the space is taken up with local{advertisements.}Readers can enjoy reports on local{organisations and{events;}and find out about future {activities.}The village{Churches}each have a page,giving information on services and parish news.Being editor is a{hobby}which she enjoys,and finds all articles{interesting}as they are about local people,recently the most exciting has been the plans for the rebuilding of{Matfield Village Hall.
